headline: CenterPoint Energy shares New Year's resolution checklist to help customers save energy and money while staying safe
summary: CenterPoint Energy encourages customers to keep safety and energy efficiency top of mind with this simple New Year's resolution checklist that can help save energy, improve safety and simplify life at home. From small changes to big impacts, these tips can assist in starting the year off right.
